Structures

Footer Base

Toggle: Notes Code
  • For use on websites where the Wiley partner's branding takes precedence over Wiley's and Wiley requires some recognition for the product
  • Please note that the exact content in the footer will be subject to the requirements set out by Wiley and the Partner
Copyright © 2000-2015 by John Wiley & Sons, Inc., or related companies. All rights reserved.
Review our privacy policy.
<div class="footer-base nodeco">
        	<div class="footer-base__content">
        		<div class="copyright"><a href="http://www.wiley.com/go/copyright">Copyright © 2000-2015</a> by <a href="http://www.wiley.com">John Wiley & Sons, Inc.</a>, or related companies. All rights reserved.<br>Review our <a href="http://www.wiley.com/go/privacy">privacy policy</a>.</div>
        		<img class="logo" alt="Black Wiley wordmark" src="/assets/toolkit/images/wiley-wordmark-black.svg">

        </div>

Typography

Callouts

Toggle: Notes Code

'Callouts' area a way to draw important information to the user with more subtlety than a full alert panel.

They are available in the following flavours:

  • Success
  • Information
  • Warning
  • Danger

Everything is going great!

This type of callout should be used for positive information.

Business as usual

Please use this callout to notify the user of neutral information

Maybe the user should take note...

The information used in the style callout should be precautionary

Something will or has gone wrong!!!

Use this to notify users of an issue that will most likely affect their experience.

<div class="ow-callout ow-callout--success">
        	<h4>Everything is going great!</h4>
        	<p>This type of callout should be used for positive information.</p>
        </div>
        
        <div class="ow-callout ow-callout--information">
        	<h4>Business as usual</h4>
        	<p>Please use this callout to notify the user of neutral information</p>
        </div>
        
        <div class="ow-callout ow-callout--warning">
        	<h4>Maybe the user should take note...</h4>
        	<p>The information used in the style callout should be precautionary</p>
        </div>
        
        <div class="ow-callout ow-callout--danger">
        	<h4>Something will or has gone wrong!!!</h4>
        	<p>Use this to notify users of an issue that will most likely affect their experience.</p>
        </div>

Copyright Line

Toggle: Notes Code

This is the full copyright strapline that should be positioned in the footer.

The copyright line is required on all Wiley owned websites.

  • Copyright © 2000-2015 must link to http://www.wiley.com/go/copyright
  • John Wiley & Sons, Inc. must link to http://www.wiley.com/
  • privacy policy must link to http://www.wiley.com/go/privacy
Copyright © 2000-2015 by John Wiley & Sons, Inc., or related companies. All rights reserved.
Review our privacy policy.
<div class="copyright"><a href="http://www.wiley.com/go/copyright">Copyright © 2000-2015</a> by <a href="http://www.wiley.com">John Wiley & Sons, Inc.</a>, or related companies. All rights reserved.<br>Review our <a href="http://www.wiley.com/go/privacy">privacy policy</a>.</div>
